+# ==============================================================================
+
+"""Seq2seq loss operations for use in neural networks.
+"""
+
+from __future__ import absolute_import
+from __future__ import division
+from __future__ import print_function
+
+from tensorflow.python.framework import dtypes
+from tensorflow.python.framework import ops
+from tensorflow.python.ops import array_ops
+from tensorflow.python.ops import math_ops
+
+__all__ = ["decoder_fn_train",
+           "decoder_fn_eval_wrapper"]
+
+def simple_decoder_fn_train(encoder_state):
+  encoder_state = ops.convert_to_tensor(encoder_state)
+
+  def decoder_fn(time, cell_state, cell_output, context_state):
+    if cell_state == None: # first call, return encoder_state
+      return (None, encoder_state, None, cell_output, context_state)
+    else:
+      return (None, cell_state, None, cell_output, context_state)
+  return decoder_fn
+
+
+def simple_decoder_fn_inference(encoder_state, embeddings,
+                                start_of_sequence_id, end_of_sequence_id,
+                                maximum_length, dtype=dtypes.int32):
+  start_of_sequence_id = ops.convert_to_tensor(start_of_sequence_id, dtype)
+  end_of_sequence_id = ops.convert_to_tensor(end_of_sequence_id, dtype)
+  maximum_length = ops.convert_to_tensor(maximum_length, dtype)
+  encoder_state = ops.convert_to_tensor(encoder_state)
+  batch_size = encoder_state.get_shape()[0].value
+  if batch_size is None:
+    batch_size = array_ops.shape(encoder_state)[0]
+
+  def decoder_fn(time, cell_state, cell_output, context_state):
+    if cell_output == None:
+      # invariant that this is time == 0
+      next_input_id = array_ops.ones([batch_size], dtype=dtype) * (
+          start_of_sequence_id)
+      done = array_ops.zeros([batch_size,], dtype=dtypes.bool)
+      cell_state = encoder_state
+    else:
+      next_input_id = math_ops.cast(math_ops.argmax(cell_output, 1),
+                                    dtype=dtype)
+      done = math_ops.equal(next_input_id, end_of_sequence_id)
+    next_input = array_ops.gather(embeddings, next_input_id)
+    # if time > maxlen, return all true vector
+    done = control_flow_ops.cond(math_ops.greater(time, maximum_length),
+        lambda: array_ops.ones([batch_size,], dtype=dtypes.bool),
+        lambda: done)
+    return (done, cell_state, next_input, cell_output, context_state)
+  re	turn decoder_fn
